nodes.text: "Shifty" Panaw was a male Jawa who lived in the dangerous region of the planet Tatooine known as the Outlaw's Den during the Cold War. He often traded scrap and other goods to those he encountered.
Panaw appears as a Black Market vendor in the Outlaw's Den, an open-world PvP zone on Tatooine in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
